Data Room

We’re Triffecta

Triffecta Retail Media is a UK-based AdTech, retail media, CPG, marketing automation innovator.

What We Do

We provide brands and agencies with an innovative retail media platform that leverages AI-driven automation to unify campaign execution and maximise revenue potential.

The Problem

Triffecta is solving the retail media industry's inefficiency problem, where fragmented systems, manual workflows and inconsistent reporting waste budgets, reduce targeting accuracy and hinder scalability, by providing scalable, automated solutions that optimise performance and unlock full market potential. Triffecta's innovation integrates across all retail media networks for seamless, AI-driven campaign execution.

The Solution

A focus on retail media execution, at scale, for brands across a diverse network of retailers.

Triffecta enables brands and agencies to scale and simplify retail media using our unified platform to plan, execute and optimise campaigns across all retail media networks from one interface.
